<h1 align="center">
  Gatsby + Contentful Reproduction
</h1>

## Getting Started

1. Clone this repo
1. Add environment variables in `.env.development` and/or `.env.production`
1. Run `yarn start`
1. Run `curl -X POST http://localhost:8000/__refresh`
    - No errors currently; investigating this further
